value:
All this time! All the effort! What has
it all been for?! Tell me, Uncle...
Duma... Someone...TELL ME!

You ask me of my...home? I have
nothing of the sort. Even Rigel is now
forever beyond my grasp...

Ah, the summoner-savior... Tell me,
do you see the strings commanding
you to dance to liars' songs?

If you thirst for power, give all you
are to Duma. Your love, your hate,
your past—everything!

Have you seen Rinea? I'm looking
for her... Rinea! Where have you
gone?! Please, answer me...

So, you are $Nu?
You will be sacrificed to Duma, as
$Nf commands.

Hah! Very good... This can only be a
blessing from Duma!
Bow before Duma's power!
Have...even the gods forsaken me?!

Show me the enemy. I will use my
new power to eradicate them!

Hah! I am Berkut! I shall end all
things...with Duma's supreme power!

You, summoner...how pitiful you are.
To the people of this world, you are
little more than a walking sacrifice.$k$pThey praise you as a savior, but once
your usefulness has run its course,
they will cast you aside...$k$pOf course, you struggle with the idea.
You want to tell me how wrong I am.
Your naivety is plain on your face.$k$pYou see only the surface of things.
Beneath, the world is cruel—everyone
hides their true intentions.$k$pSomeday, you will realize the truth as
I have... When that day comes, I will
relish the regret on your face... Hah!
でやあっ！
死ねぇっ！
ぐふっ…！
何だと？！
I'll kill you.
By Duma's power!
Look at me!
Die, die, DIE!
My power...
laugh probably evil chuckle
If you wish to be burned by Duma's flame, then by all means... Touch me once more.
Do you not know who I am? I am Rigel's next emperor! Hahaha!
Did you just utter the name Alm? Never speak that name again!
Valentia... This country... Everything! I'll see it all aflame!
Rinea... Where are you? Where did you go? Oh, Rinea...
I wished to become emperor... I wished to be a king for all of Valentia, and to see a smile upon Rinea's face...
Kriemhild shall claim your life one day. Heh... Are you looking forward to it?
The end.
What?
I will kill.
